data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Picea mariana (Black spruce) compiled from tree samples CHARLPLA

Exposition SW, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Fluvioglaziale gran. Unterl. Sand, av. Tree height 8 m, Tree cover 55%, Shrub cover 25%, Herb cover 40%, Moss cover 5%, Vegatation type: PCMA-Best. in lock. Inselgr. Nur veg. Regen. , Film number: 832A
